creator: ide
name: Theia IDE on docker
description: Theia in a sidecar container (docker)

recipe.content:
services:
  machine-exec:
    image: 'wsskeleton/che-machine-exec:latest'
    mem_limit: 536870912
  theia:
    image: 'eclipse/che-theia:plugin-id-nightly'
    mem_limit: 1073741824
    depends_on:
      - machine-exec

creator: ide
name: Java and MySQL with Theia IDE on Kubernetes
description: Multi Container Workspace - Java with MySQL database in Theia IDE

recipe.content:
kind: List
items:
 - 
  apiVersion: v1
  kind: Pod
  metadata:
   name: web
   labels:
    type: db
  spec:
   containers:
    - 
     image: registry.centos.org/che-stacks/centos-jdk8
     name: dev
     ports:
      - 
       containerPort: 8080
       protocol: TCP
     resources:
      limits:
       memory: 512Mi
    - 
     image: centos/mysql-57-centos7
     name: mysql
     ports:
      - 
       name: mysql
       containerPort: 3306
       protocol: TCP
     env:
      - 
       name: MYSQL_USER
       value: petclinic
      - 
       name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
       value: password
      - 
       name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
       value: password
      - 
       name: MYSQL_DATABASE
       value: petclinic
     resources:
      limits:
       memory: 256Mi
 - 
  apiVersion: v1
  kind: Service
  metadata:
   name: db
  spec:
   selector:
    type: db
   ports:
    - 
     name: mysql
     port: 3306
     protocol: TCP
     targetPort: mysql

commands.commandLine: cd /projects && git clone https://github.com/che-samples/web-java-spring-petclinic.git && cd web-java-spring-petclinic && git checkout mysql
commands.name: clone petclinic sample project

commands.commandLine: /opt/rh/rh-maven33/enable && mvn clean install -f ${current.project.path} && cd ${current.project.path}/target/ && cp *.war ${TOMCAT_HOME}/webapps/ROOT.war && ${TOMCAT_HOME}/bin/catalina.sh run 2>&1
commands.name: build, deploy and start Tomcat

creator: ide
name: Java-MySQL CentOS
description: Multi-machine environment with Java CentOS and MySQL database

recipe.content:
services:
 db:
  image: centos/mysql-57-centos7
  environment:
   MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: password
   MYSQL_DATABASE: petclinic
   MYSQL_USER: petclinic
   MYSQL_PASSWORD: password
  mem_limit: 1073741824
 dev-machine:
  image: registry.centos.org/che-stacks/centos-jdk8
  mem_limit: 2147483648
  depends_on:
    - db

creator: ide
name: Java-MySQL
description: Multi-machine environment with Default Java Stack and MySQL database

recipe.content:
services:
 db:
  image: eclipse/mysql
  environment:
   MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: password
   MYSQL_DATABASE: petclinic
   MYSQL_USER: petclinic
   MYSQL_PASSWORD: password
  mem_limit: 1073741824
 dev-machine:
  image: eclipse/ubuntu_jdk8
  mem_limit: 2147483648
  depends_on:
    - db

creator: ide
name: PHP
description: Default PHP Stack with PHP 7.0, most popular extensions.

commands.name: run php script
commands.commandLine: [ -z ${editor.current.file.path} ] && echo "Open a PHP file in the editor before executing this command." || php ${editor.current.file.path}

commands.name: debug php script
commands.commandLine: [ -z ${editor.current.file.path} ] && echo "Open a PHP file in the editor before executing this command." || QUERY_STRING="start_debug=1&debug_host=localhost&debug_port=10137" php ${editor.current.file.path}

creator: Ibrahim Jarif
name: Nodejs and Postgres Stack
description: Nodejs stack with Postgres

recipe.content:
kind: List
items:
 - 
  apiVersion: v1
  kind: Pod
  metadata:
   name: nodejs-postgres-pod
   annotations:
    org.eclipse.che.container.nodejs.machine_name: nodejs
    org.eclipse.che.container.database.machine_name: database
  spec:
   containers:
    - 
     image: quay.io/openshiftio/che-centos-nodejs
     name: nodejs
     ports:
      - 
       containerPort: 8080
       protocol: TCP
     resources:
      limits:
       memory: 1024Mi
    - 
     image: centos/postgresql-96-centos7
     name: database
     ports:
      - 
       containerPort: 5432
       protocol: TCP
     resources:
      limits:
       memory: 512Mi
     env:
      - 
       name: POSTGRESQL_USER
       value: user
      - 
       name: POSTGRESQL_PASSWORD
       value: password
      - 
       name: POSTGRESQL_DATABASE
       value: my_data
      - 
       name: POSTGRESQL_ADMIN_PASSWORD
       value: adminpassword

recipe.content:
kind: List
items:
 - 
  apiVersion: v1
  kind: Pod
  metadata:
   name: web
   labels:
    type: db
  spec:
   containers:
    - 
     image: eclipse/php:7.1-che7
     name: php-container
     ports:
      - 
       containerPort: 8080
       protocol: TCP
     resources:
      limits:
       memory: 512Mi
    - 
     image: centos/mysql-57-centos7
     name: mysql
     ports:
      - 
       name: mysql
       containerPort: 3306
       protocol: TCP
     env:
      - 
       name: MYSQL_USER
       value: homestead
      - 
       name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
       value: secret
      - 
       name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
       value: secret
      - 
       name: MYSQL_DATABASE
       value: homestead
     resources:
      limits:
       memory: 256Mi
 - 
  apiVersion: v1
  kind: Service
  metadata:
   name: db
  spec:
   selector:
    type: db
   ports:
    - 
     name: mysql
     port: 3306
     protocol: TCP
     targetPort: mysql
